items.sentence: Tom will eat onions if they\'ve been cooked, but he doesn\'t eat raw onions.
Tom wouldn\'t have married Mary if he\'d known she had spent time in prison.
Several illegal immigrants were found dead not far from the border crossing.
I wish they\'d be honest and admit they don\'t know what\'s going to happen.
Tom and Mary aren\'t talking about you. They\'re talking about someone else.
Tom and Mary already had three children of their own when they adopted John.
Mary said that she wouldn't marry Tom even if he were the last man on earth.
If you could only eat one thing for the rest of your life, what would it be?
Even if you go far away, let's keep in touch with each other over the phone.
Tom knew Mary wasn't very likely to be able to do what she was trying to do.
